attributes.action: Nigel Farage: Make public and formal apology for speech given in EU Parliament.
attributes.background: On 28/06/2016, Nigel Farage addressed the European parliament for the first time since the EU referendum. His speech was insulting, not only to the entirety of Europe, but to the public of the UK, half of which voted to remain. Nigel Farage needs to make a formal and public apology to the EU.
